introduction.p: The ContainerComposition property must be set to contain objects, which are typically at the left side of navigation buttons. The control template doesn't need to worry about how to display or navigate gallery items.

prop.name: ItemListTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <TextListTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for the list control in the control. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonGalleryItemList theme will be used.

prop.name: MenuTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <RibbonToolstripMenuTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for the dropdown menu. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonToolstripMenu theme will be used.

prop.name: HeaderTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ControlTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for group headers in the dropdown menu. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonToolstripMenu theme will be used.

prop.name: BackgroundTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <SelectableButtonTemplate/>.

This property defines a control template for gallery item backgrounds for gallery items in the dropdown menu. If this property is empty, the default control template for the ListItemBackground theme will be used.

prop.name: GroupContainerTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ScrollViewTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for the gallery item container in the dropdown menu. If this property is empty, the default control template for the ScrollView theme will be used.
